5lerr0mq.label: 60hz
5lerr0mq.rules:
**Allowed game versions/platforms:**  
· PS3  
· PS2 NTSC-J  
· PS2 PAL on 60hz Mode (refer to Game Rules for clarification)

New Game+ runs are invalid for this category.

**Timer start:**  
PS3: Upon pressing "New Game"  
PS2: Upon pressing "Yes" or "No" on Vibration menu.  
Timer stops on the frame the camera shifts to show Ico and Yorda on the final cutscene at the beach.

Quitting the game and reloading a save is not allowed at any point of the run.

Emulators are banned.  
Video proof is required for every submission.  
Your video MUST show the total in-game time at the end by saving the game to be verified.

0q5nnm7q.rules:

4lxppk3q.label: PS2 NTSC-U
4lxppk3q.rules:
**Allowed game versions/platforms:**  
· PS2 NTSC-U

Timer starts upon pressing "Yes" or "No" on Vibration menu.  
Timer stops on the frame the camera shifts to show Ico and Yorda on the final cutscene at the beach.  
IGT is not required for this category.

Emulators are banned.  
Video proof is required for every submission.

ndx53ook.name: Co-op
ndx53ook.rules: Beat the game on 2-player mode (only available on New Game+).

jq600wvq.label: 60hz
jq600wvq.rules:
**Allowed game versions/platforms:**  
· PS3  
· PS2 NTSC-J  
· PS2 PAL on 60hz Mode (refer to Game Rules for clarification)

New Game+ is required for this run.  
2 Player mode needs to be activated in-game during the run.

**Timer start:**  
PS3: Upon selecting a finished game file.  
PS2: Upon pressing "Yes" or "No" on Vibration menu.  
Timer stops on the frame the camera shifts to show Ico and Yorda on the final cutscene at the beach.  
IGT is not required for this category.

Quitting the game and reloading a save is not allowed at any point of the run.

Emulators are banned.  
Video proof is required for every submission.

**Important note about submissions:**  
When you submit a run, please set Player 1 as the runner controlling Ico and Player 2 as the runner controlling Yorda.  
If your submission appears as broken or showing only one name to it, please contact a mod!

5lmkke8q.label: 50hz
5lmkke8q.rules:
**Allowed game versions/platforms:**  
· PS2 PAL on 50hz Mode (refer to Game Rules for clarification)

New Game+ is required for this run.  
2 Player mode needs to be activated in-game during the run.

Timer starts upon pressing "Yes" or "No" on Vibration menu.  
Timer stops on the frame the camera shifts to show Ico and Yorda on the final cutscene at the beach.  
IGT is not required for this run.

Quitting the game and reloading a save is not allowed at any point of the run.

Emulators are banned.  
Video proof is required for every submission.

**Important note about submissions:**  
When you submit a run, please set Player 1 as the runner controlling Ico and Player 2 as the runner controlling Yorda.  
If your submission appears as broken or showing only one name to it, please contact a mod!

vdox81vd.name: Enlightenment
vdox81vd.rules:
Achieve Enlightenment (ICO Platinum Trophy)

**Allowed game versions/platforms:**  
· PS3

You're required to do this run under a brand new PS3 user so that trophy pop-ups can be seen on screen.

Timer starts upon pressing "New Game".  
Timer stops when the "Enlightenment" trophy pop-up appears on screen.  
IGT is not required to submit for this category.

Emulators are banned.  
Video proof is required for every submission.  
Your video must show **ALL** trophy pop-ups during your run for it to be valid. A full list of these can be found in a guide by SanchoPanda.

w20q318d.name: 50hz
w20q318d.rules: Yeets allowed, but bench saves are the same. HAHA, now you can't skip the water puzzles!

ewp3e0jd.name: 1. Beginning
ewp3e0jd.rules: From New Game to Graveyard bench. Your time is the IGT from the Graveyard bench save. The save time must be shown in the video as proof.

w20q318d.name: 50hz
w20q318d.rules: Yeets allowed, but bench saves are the same. HAHA, now you can't skip the water puzzles!

y9m6y1xw.name: 2. Shadow
y9m6y1xw.rules: From Graveyard bench to Stone Pillar bench (after pulling the lever for the rope in 60hz, though in 50hz it won't be necessary). Your time is the IGT of the Stone Pillar bench save MINUS the IGT of the Graveyard bench save. Both save times must be shown in the video as proof.

w20q318d.name: 50hz
w20q318d.rules: Yeets allowed, but bench saves are the same. HAHA, now you can't skip the water puzzles!

5wkx81p9.name: 3. Darkness
5wkx81p9.rules: From Stone Pillar bench to E. Arena bench (after East Reflector activation cutscene). Your time is the IGT of the E. Arena bench save MINUS the IGT of the Stone Pillar bench save. Both save times must be shown in the video as proof.

w20q318d.name: 50hz
w20q318d.rules: Yeets allowed, but bench saves are the same. HAHA, now you can't skip the water puzzles!

592k3n39.name: 4. Heal
592k3n39.rules: From E. Arena bench to Waterfall bench (after turning off the waterfall). Your time is the IGT of the Waterfall bench save MINUS the IGT of the E. Arena bench save. Both save times must be shown in the video as proof.

w20q318d.name: 50hz
w20q318d.rules: Yeets allowed, but bench saves are the same. HAHA, now you can't skip the water puzzles!

29v6j5lw.name: 5. Continue
29v6j5lw.rules: From Waterfall bench to W. Idol Stairs bench (upon first entry in that area). Your time is the IGT of the W. Idol Stairs bench save MINUS the IGT of the Waterfall bench save. Both save times must be shown in the video as proof.

w20q318d.name: 50hz
w20q318d.rules: Yeets allowed, but bench saves are the same. HAHA, now you can't skip the water puzzles!

xd41nrrd.name: 6. Deja Vu
xd41nrrd.rules: From W. Idol Stairs bench to Main Gate bench (before opening the gate). Your time is the IGT of the Main Gate bench save MINUS the IGT of the W. Idol Stairs bench save. Both save times must be shown in the video as proof.

w20q318d.name: 50hz
w20q318d.rules: Yeets allowed, but bench saves are the same. HAHA, now you can't skip the water puzzles!

xd01l34w.name: 7. Queen
xd01l34w.rules: From Main Gate bench to Beach run. Your time is the IGT of the Main Gate bench save MINUS the IGT of the final save after reaching Yorda. Both save times must be shown in the video as proof.

w20q318d.name: 50hz
w20q318d.rules: Yeets allowed, but bench saves are the same. HAHA, now you can't skip the water puzzles!
